TimeoutProg.cpp

00002 // Standard includes
00003 #include "TimeoutProg.h"
00004 
00005 TimeoutProg::TimeoutProg(int TimeInMs) :
00006 #ifdef DEBUG_THREAD
00007     Thread( "TimeoutProg" )
00008 #else
00009     Thread()
00010 #endif
00011 {
00012     if ( TimeInMs <= 0 )
00013     {
00014         TimeToTimeOutInMs = 2*60*1000;  // 2 minutes
00015     }
00016     else
00017     {
00018         TimeToTimeOutInMs = TimeInMs;
00019     }
00020 }
00021 
00022 TimeoutProg::~TimeoutProg()
00023 {
00024     StopThread();
00025 }
00026 
00027 void FUNCTION_CALL_TYPE TimeoutProg::Run()
00028 {
00029     ElapsedTime TimeAlreadyWaited;
00030 
00031     while( StopPending() == false && TimeAlreadyWaited.Get() < TimeToTimeOutInMs )
00032     {
00033         Sleep( 100 );
00034     }
00035 
00036     if ( StopPending() == false )
00037     {
00038         fprintf( stderr, "Timout !!! (%.2f)\n", ((float)TimeAlreadyWaited.Get())/1000.0f );
00039         exit(-1);
00040     }
00041 }
00042 
00043 } // namespace Omiscid
